Package controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
controller.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the main game engine which carry out commands of the players

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameEngine​(java.util.Scanner p_scannerObject)
    This constructor is used to set the scanner object context

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addRemovePlayers​(java.lang.String[] p_commandList)
    Used to add/remove players
    void assignCountries()
    This function is used to assign countries to all the players as per the rules and then start the Game Engine.
    void assignReinforcements()
    This function is used to assign reinforcements to the players as per the game rules
    void executeOrderLoop()
    This function is used to loop over all the players in round-robin fashion to request execute orders
    MapState getMapState()
    Get the current map state.
    PlayersState getPlayersState()
    Get the current players state.
    void issueOrderLoop()
    This function is used to loop over all the players in round-robin fashion to request issue orders
    void loadGameEngine()
    This function loads the Game Engine machine that starts the game and initializes the main game loop.
    void loadGameEngineConsole()
    Used to load the GameEngine console for game play phase

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
